name: I don't eat animals - cross stitch
description:
Since last year I'm vegetarian and I love to tell to everybody that I don't eat animals,
so I made this cross stitch to hang at my house!

Is made with dark blue dmc on aida cloth, framed in a hoop measures 12 cm (5'') and is ready to hang and backet to preserve the artwork.

(I can use also red, green and black aida cloth and any embroidery thread colours you want, email me!)

name: Iceland - embroidery
description:
Hand-stitched Map of Iceland in gold and light grey dmc thread on a vintage cotton, set in a wooden embroidery hoop.

Backed with fabric to preserve the artwork, the hoop measures 12 cm (5'') and is ready to hang and backet to preserve the artwork.

Part of an ongoing series (I have also Antartica but I can make what you want, email me!)

Please email me for any question you may have or for more photos and details.

name: Antarctica - embroidery
description:
Hand-stitched Map of Antarctica in gold and light grey dmc thread on a vintage cotton, set in a wooden embroidery hoop.

Backed with fabric to preserve the artwork, the hoop measures 12 cm (5'') and is ready to hang and backet to preserve the artwork.

Part of an ongoing series.

Please email me for any question you may have or for more photos and details.

name: Crochet coasters
description:
Set of four handmade crochet coaster.

Made by leftovers blue-green acrylic and blue wool, crochet like an old america square. its measures 11x11 cm. (4,3x4,3 inch).
